channel.title: How to change text color above head
channel.description:
Hello, Bender here. I am going to show you how to make your words appear a different color in game when you say them.
1. Search in client.Java for: if(s.startsWith("yellow:")) 2. Once found scroll up or down until you see the color you want. 3. Above that color you should see something like: j2 = 5; (flash1) change the 5 to a 1. 4. Save and compile, restart client and voule you have a text change.
If that doesn't work try making yellow's j2 = 1 - 0
I hope you all like, Please don't flame this is my first tutorial so not that good in form.

Read full topic

if(s.startsWith("yellow:")) { j2 = 0; aString887 = aString887.substring(7); } else if(s.startsWith("red:")) { j2 = 1; aString887 = aString887.substring(4); } else if(s.startsWith("green:")) { j2 = 2; aString887 = aString887.substring(6); } else if(s.startsWith("cyan:")) { j2 = 3; aString887 = aString887.substring(5); } else if(s.startsWith("purple:")) { j2 = 4; aString887 = aString887.substring(7); } else if(s.startsWith("white:")) { j2 = 5; aString887 = aString887.substring(6); } else

item.title: How to change text color above head
item.dc:creator: @bender4 bender4
item.description:
@bender4 wrote:

Hello, Bender here. I am going to show you how to make your words appear a different color in game when you say them.

  1. Search in client.Java for: if(s.startsWith(“yellow:”))
  2. Once found scroll up or down until you see the color you want.
  3. Above that color you should see something like: j2 = 5; (flash1) change the 5 to a 1.
  4. Save and compile, restart client and voule you have a text change.

If that doesn’t work try making yellow’s j2 = 1 - 0

I hope you all like, Please don’t flame this is my first tutorial so not that good in form.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change text color above head
